views.markdown:
Version 1.0.5 - Added Support Compatibility for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12 Devices. - Code Improves and Cleanup. Version 1.0.3
- Added the fully compatibility with iOS 10 (tested on iPhone 7 iOS 10.1.1).
- Added the option to Dim the Wi Fi icon when/while connecting.
- Redefined, Changed and New Graphic for the Preferences Panel.
- Code Improvements, Changes and (hopefully) Fixes.
- Some other internal small Changes.
- Code Cleanup.
- I am almost certain it is working on iOS 8.3, 8.4 since ever (i am going to test this as soon as possible but please let me know, thanks).
